metadata.title: CVE-2021-43453 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A Heap-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability exists in JerryScript 2.4.0 and prior versions via an out-of-bounds read in parser_parse_for_statement_start in the js-parser-statm.c file. This issue is similar to CVE-2020-29657.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
